member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.DomName.TryParseMFString(System.String,JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.DomName,JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.DomName@)

member.name: T:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ICloneAnswer
member.summary: Defines a CloneAnswer Plug-In for Simple DNS Plus
member.remarks: Implement this interface to create a CloneAnswer plug-in for Simple DNS Plus.

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ICloneAnswer.LookupCloneAnswer(JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IRequestContext)
member.summary: Perform an clone name lookup
member.param: DNS request context information.
member.returns: Result object, or Null/Nothing if no alias is found.
member.remarks: Simple DNS Plus creates a cloned answer based on the prefixLabels, cloneFromZone and forceAA parameters. First a "clone QName" is constructed from the prefix + cloneFromZone. Then a new DNS request for "clone QName" and same query type (A, MX, etc.) as original request is processed. The resulting DNS answer is cloned by changing record names as well as domain names in record data. Names that end with cloneFromZone will have this ending changed to the originally requested zone name (request.QName less prefix). IMPORTANT: Plug-ins will be re-queried using "clone QName", so it is important to design this function so that this does not cause an endless loop.

member.name: F:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ICloneAnswer.Result.CloneFromZone
member.summary: Name of zone to clone answer from

member.name: F:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ICloneAnswer.Result.PrefixLabels
member.summary: The number of labels (segment between dots) of request.QName (from left) that make up the "prefix". Return 0 for no prefix (QName = Zone name)

member.name: F:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ICloneAnswer.Result.ForceAA
member.summary: True if the AA flag (authoritative) should be set in cloned answer. Return false to use the AA falg value from the answer that is being cloned

member.name: T:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IRequestContext
member.summary: Provides information about an incoming DNS request

member.summary: The IP address that the DNS request came from

member.name: P:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IRequestContext.RD
member.summary: Indicates if the sender requested recursion (RD request header flag).

member.name: P:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IRequestContext.QName
member.summary: The requested domain name

member.name: P:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IRequestContext.QType
member.summary: The requested DNS record type

member.name: P:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IRequestContext.QNameIP
member.summary: IP address (in reverse) represented by leading labels of requested domain names in reverse and DNSBL lookups.

member.name: P:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IRequestContext.RA
member.summary: Indicates if Simple DNS Plus provides recursion for this request (RA response header flag)

member.name: P:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IRequestContext.AA
member.summary: Indicates if Simple DNS Plus is authoritative for the requested name (AA response header flag)

DNS request and context information

member.summary: The resulting value

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IHost.LogLine(System.String)
member.summary: Call this method to record a message to the Simple DNS Plus log.
member.param: The message to record in the log

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IHost.SaveConfig(System.String)
member.summary: Call this method to save configuration data
member.param: Configuration data (user defined format)
member.remarks: Should only be used when the plug-in configuration is changed by something other than the Options dialog.

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IHost.AsyncError(System.Exception)
member.summary: Call this method to log an exception from an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The Exception object
member.remarks: Plug-in operations executing in seperate threads (asynchronous methods) should catch all unhandled exceptions, and call this method with the exception, Otherwise Simple DNS Plus will crash in case of such an exception. Execeptions in methods executing in Simple DNS Plus' own threads are automatically caught and should not call this method.

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IHost.Signal(System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Signal from plug-in to the Simple DNS Plus host - Details defined per signal code (code parameter)
member.param: Signal code
Signal data
member.returns: A Task which can be awaited to get result of signal operation (object)

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IHost.UpdateHost(JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.DomName,JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.SdnsIP,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Call this function to update a host record (A/AAAA) in a local primary DNS zone.
member.param: The name of the host record to update
The IP address of the host - or null/nothing to delete any existing host records for the name
DNS record TTL value. Specify -1 to use the zone's default TTL value
Any comments to be stored with the DNS record in the zone file
member.returns: A Task which can be awaited to get result of operation
member.remarks: The update will fail unless a local primary zone with a parent name of the host name exists

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IHost.UpdateHostReverse(JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.SdnsIP,JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.DomName,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Call this function to update a reverse DNS record (PTR) in a local primary reverse DNS zone (IPv4 or IPv6).
member.param: The IP address of the reverse DNS record.
The host name for the IP address- or root to delete any existing host records for the name
DNS record TTL value. Specify -1 to use the zone's default TTL value
Any comments to be stored with the DNS record in the zone file
member.returns: A Task which can be awaited to get result of operation
member.remarks: The update will fail unless a local primary reverse zone for the IP address exists

member.name: T:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IQuestions
member.summary: Implement this interface in plug-ins that provide one or more questions that Simple DNS Plus can ask of the plug-in.
member.remarks: In Simple DNS Plus v. 5.2, these questions are used only in DNS request access rules for other plug-ins. Future Simple DNS Plus versions may define other uses for them.

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IQuestions.QuestionList
member.summary: Called by Simple DNS Plus to retrieve a list of questions answered by this plug-in.

member.summary: Called by Simple DNS Plus to ask a question

String value entered at configuration (ValuePrompt).
DNS request and context information
member.returns: Answer to the question (true/false)

member.summary: Information about a question

member.summary: The question in text

member.name: F:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IQuestions.QuestionInfo.ValuePrompt
member.summary: The text to display to prompt the user for text value. Null/Nothing is user should not be prompted for this.

member.summary: Implement this interface in plug-ins that in some way lists IP addresses. This can be used to create DNS request access rules for other plug-ins. I.E. "allow access if plug-in xyz lists the sender's IP address".

member.summary: Test if plug-in lists an IP address
member.param: The IP address to look for
member.returns: True if the IP address is listed

member.summary: Implement this interface in plug-ins that in some way lists domain names. This can be used to create DNS request access rules for other plug-ins. I.E. "allow access if plug-in xyz lists the requested domain name".

member.summary: The if plug-in lists a domain name
member.param: The domain name to look for
member.returns: True if the domain name is listed

member.name: T:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ISkip
member.summary: Defines a Skip Plug-In for Simple DNS Plus
member.remarks: Implement this interface to create a Skip plug-in for Simple DNS Plus.

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ISkip.LookupSkip(JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IRequestContext)
member.summary: Perform a DNS lookup.
member.param: DNS request and context information
member.returns: How many plug-in instances to skip. Return -1 to skip all remaining plug-in instances.

member.name: T:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ITSIGUpdateHost
member.summary: Implement this interface in plug-ins which can authenticate and process TSIG signed dynamic update requests for a single host record

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ITSIGUpdateHost.GetTSIGKeySecret(JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.DomName,System.String)
member.summary: Called by Simple DNS Plus to get the key value (secret) for a TSIG key in order to verify a TSIG signature of a received dynamic DNS update packet.
member.param: The TSIG key name (user ID) presented by the client
The signing algorithm used (HMAC-MD5, HMAC-SHA1, HMAC-SHA256, HMAC-SHA384 or HMAC-SHA512)
member.returns: TSIG key value (secret), or null/nothing if keyName does not exist

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ITSIGUpdateHost.TSIGUpdateHost(JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.SdnsIP,JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.DomName,System.String,JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.DomName,JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.SdnsIP,System.Int32)
member.summary: Called by Simple DNS Plus to complete a TSIG signed dynamic DNS update
member.param: The IP address that the update request originates from
The TSIG key name (user ID) presented by the client
The signing algorithm used (HMAC-MD5, HMAC-SHA1, HMAC-SHA256, HMAC-SHA384 or HMAC-SHA512)
The name of the updated host record
The IP address of the updated host record
The TTL (time to live) value of the updated host record
member.returns: False if the request update is not allowed - otherwise true
member.remarks: Simple DNS Plus will call this method after calling GetTSIGKeySecret only if the TSIG signature was verfied.

member.name: T:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IViewUI
member.summary: Implement this interface in plug-ins that have a View (main Simple DNS Plus Windows / View menu).

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IViewUI.GetViewUI
member.summary: Simple DNS Plus calls this function to retrieve an instance of a View UI control.

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IViewUI.MsgFromViewUI(System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: A message has been received from a View UI instance
member.param: The connection ID of the View UI sending the message. This ID can be used for sending a message back to the same ViewUI throught the MsgToViewUI event.
The message data received (format/content defined by plug-in)
member.remarks: This method is called by the ViewUI.SendMsgToService (via Simple DNS Plus infrastructure). Several View UIs may be connected at the same time, for example if the server computer has multiple terminal server sessions open.

member.name: E:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.IViewUI.MsgToViewUI
member.summary: Raise this event to send a message to the View UI.
member.param: Connection ID of the View UI to send the message to. Use -1 to send the message to all connected View UIs.
The message data to send (format/content defined by plug-in)
member.remarks: Raising this event calls the ViewUI.MsgFromService method (via Simple DNS Plus infrastructure). Several View UIs may be connected at the same time, for example if the server computer has multiple terminal server sessions open.

member.name: T:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.OptionsUI
member.summary: GUI control for configuring plug-in settings hosted in the Plug-in Instance dialog / Plug-In Settings tab.
member.remarks: Create a user control inheriting from this and return and instance of that in the IGethostPlugIn.GetOptionUI method.

member.name: F:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.OptionsUI.RemoteGUI
member.summary: Simple DNS Plus sets this to true if GUI is currently connected to another machine.

member.name: F:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.OptionsUI.GetServerIPs
member.summary: Invoke this to retrieve a list of local IP addresses and their subnets (IPv4 only) on the server

member.name: T:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.OptionsUI.GetServerIPsDG
member.summary: Delegation definition for GetServerIPs
member.returns: List of local IP addresses and their subnets (IPv4 only) on the server.

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.OptionsUI.LoadData(System.String)
member.summary: Load plug-in configuration data into OptionsUI
member.param: Configuration data (user defined format). Null/Nothing for new plug-in instances.
member.remarks: The configuration data corresponds to the string returned by the SaveData method. Simple DNS Plus calls this method when the Plug-In Instance dialog is opened.

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.OptionsUI.ValidateData
member.summary: Validate the data entered by the user in the OptionsUI
member.returns: True if the data entered is valid, otherwise False.
member.remarks: Simple DNS Plus calls this method when the user clicks the OK button in the Plug-In Instance dialog. If the entered data is invalid (method returning False), you should show a message box explaining the problem.

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.OptionsUI.SaveData
member.summary: Save the configuration data entered by the user in the OptionsUI
member.returns: Configuration data (user defined format)
member.remarks: The data returned by this method is used by the LoadData method and the IPlugInBase.LoadConfig method. Simple DNS Plus calls this method only after calling ValidateData and only if ValidateData returns True.

member.name: T:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.OptionsUI.IPandSubnet
member.summary: Represents an local interface IP addresses and subnet

member.name: F:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.OptionsUI.IPandSubnet.IPAddr
member.summary: IP address

member.name: F:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.OptionsUI.IPandSubnet.SubnetMaskSize
member.summary: Subnet mask size in bits

member.name: T:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ViewUI
member.summary: GUI control representing a plug-in View UI - a tab in the Simple DNS Plus main window.
member.remarks: Create a user control inheriting from this and return and instance of that in the IGethostPlugIn.GetViewUI method.

member.name: F:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ViewUI.RemoteGUI
member.summary: Simple DNS Plus sets this to true if GUI is currently connected to another machine.

member.name: E:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ViewUI.MsgFromViewUI
member.summary: This event is handled by Simple DNS Plus and must not be handled any by plug-in code.
member.param: N/A

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ViewUI.SendMsgToService(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Send a message to the plug-in service.
member.param: The message data to send (format/content defined by plug-in)
member.remarks: This method calls the IGetHostPlugIn.MsgFromViewUI method (via Simple DNS Plus infrastructure)

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ViewUI.MsgFromService(System.Byte[])
member.summary: A message has been received from the plug-in service.
member.param: The message data to send (format/content defined by plug-in)
member.remarks: This method is called (via Simple DNS Plus infrastructure) when the IgetHostPlugIn.MsgToViewUI event is raised.

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ViewUI.SaveLayout
member.summary: Save the current window layout
member.returns: Layout data (user defined format)
member.remarks: Called by Simple DNS Plus before closing ViewUI

member.name: M:JHSoftware.SimpleDNS.Plugin.ViewUI.LoadLayout(System.String)
member.summary: Load window layout
member.param: Layout data (user defined format)
member.remarks: Called by Simple DNS Plus when loading ViewUI. Load layout previously saved through SaveLayout method.
